item.description:
The days are getting shorter...but the nights are getting longer.
Don't hesitate to celebrate with friends so great they radiate.
We'll raise a glass, apps will pass, and we'll move into the night en masse.
Informal ice-breakers, hors d'oeuvres, cash bar, music and optional group

The following group outings will be formed:
1) dinner at Vlora!
2) outings to the Coolidge Corner and Kendall SquareTheaters!
3) Excursion to the Milk Way in JP for Latin Dance Night!

$10 at the door, excludes costs incurred after the mixer @ Vlora
item.how_to_find_us: I'll greet you at the door.
item.name: Bring Back The Night Party
